text: Stefan Maurer (6 October 1960 - 28 January 1994) was a Swiss cyclist. He competed in the individual road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. He drowned in a diving accident in Thailand in 1994. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Switzerland Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Schaffhausen Category:Deaths by drowning
title: Stefan Maurer
